name: Prison Texas
description:
Bet your bottom dollar in Texas hold 'em with the prison boss, who seems to have a better hand than yours every time, but you're not here to lose money.

Game Play

1. Use Mouse to move your right hand, When your right-hand touches the deck, it will display the exchangeable cards on the left.

2. Use the A/D key to switch the card you intend to change on your hand.

3. Press the left mouse button to swap two cards.

4. Press the space bar to confirm showing your hand.

5. Don't try to swap cards while your opponent is looking at you!
